definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: Algae-lysing bacteria would be one of controlling methods for microcystis water-bloom.
sentences.chinese: 溶藻細菌有可能作爲微囊藻水華控制的方法之一。

sentences.english: To compare the antifebrile effects of ethanol extracts of cyperus tuber before and after microcapsulization.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察香附乙醇提取物微囊化前後的解熱效應。

sentences.english: Microcystis aeruginosa is a kind of toxic cyanobacteria that wide-ranging living in stagnant water.
sentences.chinese: 銅綠微囊藻是一種廣泛存在於靜水水體中的有毒藍藻。

sentences.english: Relationship between algal cell density and concentration of microcystin LR were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究藻細胞密度和微囊藻毒素LR濃度的相關關係。

sentences.english: M. aeruginosa inhibited the feeding rates of the two cladocerans.
sentences.chinese: 有毒微囊藻還可抑制這兩種枝角類的濾食率。

sentences.english: In the hunger state, fish may accumulate toxins more easily.
sentences.chinese: 在飢餓狀態下，魚類更容易富集微囊藻毒素。

sentences.english: The studies proved the feasibility of the preparation of microcapsule from chitosan for the use in carbonless paper.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明了用殼聚糖製備無碳複寫紙用微囊的可行性。

sentences.english: Ethylcellulose( EC ) was used as wall materials to prepare EC- propolis microcapsules, by the physical chemistry method.
sentences.chinese: 以乙基纖維素爲囊材，採用物理化學法制備蜂膠微囊。

sentences.english: Encapsulated ratio is an important parameter in quality control of pesticide capsule.
sentences.chinese: 成囊率是評價農藥微囊質量的一個重要指標。

sentences.english: The wet microcapsules released more quickly than dry microcapsules.
sentences.chinese: 溼微囊溶出高於幹微囊。

sentences.english: The wet microcapsules released more quickly than dry microcapsules.
sentences.chinese: 溼微囊溶出高於幹微囊。

sentences.english: Therefore, we have classified the signet-ring cell carcinoma into the mucous type and microcystic type.
sentences.chinese: 由此，我們把胃印戒細胞癌分爲粘液型和微囊型兩型。

sentences.english: Objective:To compare the antifebrile effects of ethanol extracts of cyperus tuber before and after microcapsulization.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察香附乙醇提取物微囊化前後的解熱效應。

sentences.english: Microcystin(MCYSTs, MCs)is a common algal toxin in eutrophic fresh water body.
sentences.chinese: 微囊藻毒素爲富營養化淡水中最常見的藻類毒素。

sentences.english: Microcystins are one of indicators for water quality.
sentences.chinese: 微囊藻毒素將成爲衡量水質好壞的指標之一。

sentences.english: The survival time of transplanted islets was about 6W.
sentences.chinese: 微囊化胰島移植組胰島有功能存活時間＞6W。

definition: polypeptide, chain of amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH, a component of protein
peptide (two or more amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH)
polysaccharide (complex carbohydrate such as starch 澱粉|淀粉 and cellulose 纖維素|纤维素)
